ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: It really depends on what you are fighting. I am LVL 23 and I am always memorizing new spells. All you can do is memorize the spells you think you will need
ygData.messageBody:
It really depends on what you are fighting. I am LVL 23 and I am always
memorizing new spells. All you can do is memorize the spells you think you
will need next. It takes practice. Good luck

In a message dated 6/21/99 10:20:54 PM Central Daylight Time,
Cycas@... writes:

<< Hi yall, i've been playing EQ for sometime now - but never a cleric
until one i just started. I noticed we have like 15 spells that are
casted often and i can't decide on what to keep memmed at all times.
please let me know what you all have memmed or any suggestions =)
>>
